news_header: Google has renamed the Gulf of Mexico to the Gulf of America on its maps, following a directive from President Donald Trump. The company has also restricted negative reviews for the Gulf of Mexico in its map services.
news_original_title: Google esti ihmisiä antamasta huonoja arvioita Meksikonlahdelle karttapalvelussaan
news_text: This change has led users to express their dissatisfaction by leaving one-star reviews for Google Maps in Apple's app store, a form of online protest known as review bombing.
